channel.title: Simulation on The Indian Engineer
channel.description: Recent content in Simulation on The Indian Engineer

item.title: Problem 874 Walking Robot Simulation
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 874 Question A robot on an infinite XY-plane starts at point (0, 0) facing north.

item.title: Problem 2326 Spiral Matrix IV
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2326 Question You are given two integers m and n, which represent the dimensions of a matrix.

item.title: Problem 2022 Convert 1D Array to 2D Array
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 2022 Question You are given a 0-indexed 1-dimensional (1D) integer array original, and two integers, m and n.

item.title: Problem 3274 Check if Two Chessboard Squares Have the Same Color
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 3274 Question You are given two strings, coordinate1 and coordinate2, representing the coordinates of a square on an 8 x 8 chessboard.

item.title: Problem 3238 Find the Number of Winning Players
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 3238 Question You are given an integer n representing the number of players in a game and a 2D array pick where pick[i] = [xi, yi] represents that the player xi picked a ball of color yi.

item.title: Problem 1701 Average Waiting Time
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 1701 Question There is a restaurant with a single chef.
